Course_Name: GPE: Global Production Management II VL SS2024

Messages.Author: Holger Kohl
Messages.Content: Dear Students, based on oyur feedback we will try to reschedule the GPM II - Exercise. I will get back to you soon with an update on the dates. BR Prof. Dr.-Ing. Holger Kohl

Messages.Author: Holger Kohl
Messages.Content: Dear GPE Students, The GPM II - Exercise will be held from 23rd to 25th September 2024 at PTZ. I hope this fits in with your travel and holiday plans! Please make sure that you are back in Berlin at that time, as the exercise is a mandatory part of the GPM module!  We will also inform you very soon about the organisation of the remaining elements of the GPM I - Exercise (Learning Factory).  I wish you all the best for the GPM exam.  See you soon Prof. Dr. Holger Kohl

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Lecture 24: Industrial Product Service Systems - IPS²

Messages.Author: Holger Kohl
Messages.Content: Dear Students, I am very sorry to inform you that due to a very urgent business trip to China I will not be able to give the lecture in person next week. Instead, I will upload a video lecture within the next days and we will see each other in the live lecture the week after. Sorry again for the short notice! BR and have a good week Prof. Dr.-Ing. Holger Kohl
